The National Archaeological Museum of Chiusi is a museum in Chiusi, Siena, Italy. It contains Ancient Greek, Etruscan, Ancient Roman and Lombard items, many of which have been excavated in the surrounding province. The museum also has a restoration laboratory, specializing in archaeological materials.
Some excavated items
File:Group of Polygnotos ARV 1054 60 three youths with lyrai - three draped youths (02).jpg | A Greek vase
File:Olpe con scena di palestra, 500-490 aC, ceramica di produzione etrusca.jpg | An Etruscan vase
File:Etruscan cinerary urn, Museo Archeologico Nazionale di Chiusi -q07.jpg | An Etruscan urn
File:Chiusi sfinge etrusca.jpg | An Etruscan phoenix
